sentences.en: A crescent moon peeped out from behind the clouds.
a small crescent of pastry topped with cheese
sentences.cn: 顶上浇有奶酪的新月形油酥小糕点

sentences.en: Any wisp of cloud could cover a crescent moon. My future was dark.
sentences.cn: 一点云便能把月牙遮住, 我的将来是黑暗.

sentences.en: During the next three or four years I somehow never saw the crescent moon.
sentences.cn: 我在三四年里似乎没再看见月牙.

sentences.en: Here, in here, I saw my old friend again - the crescent moon.
sentences.cn: 在这里, 在这里, 我又看见了我的好朋友,月牙儿!

sentences.en: I had lost the crescent moon, and myself as well. I was the same as Mama!
sentences.cn: 我失去那个月牙儿, 也失去了自己, 我和妈妈一样了!

sentences.en: Men are subject to sudden changes of fortune as the moon is subject to the changes of being full and crescent, cloudy and clear.
sentences.cn: 人有旦夕祸福, 月有阴晴圆缺.

sentences.en: Some times, even after the crescent moon had already risen , she would still be scrubbing away.
sentences.cn: 有时月牙儿已经上来, 她还哼哧哼哧的洗.

sentences.en: That crescent moon brings everything back.
The belt is a westward - opening crescent.
sentences.cn: 成矿带呈西端张开的新月状.

sentences.en: The crescent moon gave off faint rays that seemed to tremble in the cool breeze.
sentences.cn: 那可怕的月牙放着一点光,仿佛在凉风里颤动.

sentences.en: The moon was a brightly shining crescent.
sentences.cn: 那晚的月亮是一弯闪闪发亮的新月.

sentences.en: They decided a housing co-operative was the way to regenerate Ormiston Crescent.
sentences.cn: 他们最终决定通过住房合作社来重建奥米斯顿月牙街。

sentences.en: When she smiled, her eyes resembled a pair of crescent moons.
sentences.cn: 她那双眼睛,笑起来就像一对月牙儿.

sentences.en: Yes, I've seen the crescent moon again - a chill sickle of pale gold.
sentences.cn: 是的, 我又看见月牙儿了,带着点寒气的一钩儿浅金.

words.tran_cn: 新月；新月状物；伊斯兰教的标记；土耳其的新月形国徽

phrases.tran_cn: 红新月会（穆斯林国家的一种组织）

trans.tran_cn: 新月，月牙，伊斯兰教的标记
trans.tran_en: a curved shape that is wider in the middle and pointed at the ends

trans.tran_cn: 以新月形物装饰；使成新月形
